description: {"blocks":[{"key":"94dpt","text":"PEG (Polyethylene Glycol) is a chemically inert, nontoxic, water-soluble synthetic polymer and has been used in aqueous polymer two-phase systems that help concentrating and isolating viruses from a variety of environmental samples. PEG is known as a good inductor of attractive interactions that crystallize viruses in the interpolymer spaces between PEG molecules. So, the combination of PEG concentration and RNA extraction steps enable 900– 1500X concentration of wastewater samples and sufficiently eliminate most of the organic matter, which could inhibit the subsequent qPCR assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ee0h","text":"Collect      of sewage samples in a sterile Whirl-Pak bag and disinfect the sampling bag with ethanol to avoid contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnujk","text":" Transfer the bag to the laboratory in a cold chain   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fb8vt","text":"The sewage sample is transferred to a sterile   Nalgene centrifuge bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6j29","text":"Add    of PEG 8000 and    of NaCl in    of  the sample to get the final concentrations of   (w/v) and     respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":90,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5.6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"humidity","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"","id":0}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.3","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ei2r6","text":"Vortex the mixture at   for    until the reagents are completely dissolved in the suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"500","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ohct","text":" Thereafter, seal the Nalgene bottles using the cap assembly, and centrifuge the mixture at   until the pellet is visibly seen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":7200,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6olhm","text":" Resuspend the pellet in    of PBS ( ). Then, aliquot    of the suspension into each of 3 screw cap tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36r8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.4"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1de6n","text":"The resulting pellet is stored at    until further process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djlmk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g63d","text":"Freeze-thawing of primary concentrates is limited to once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nvgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
